name: semantic-accessible-component-library
description: Collection of sematic, accessible components that are fully independant and reusable
author: Liam Raven <liamraven@gmail.com>

scripts.release: lerna bootstrap && lerna version && lerna publish --contents dist from-package && bit add components/* && bit status && bit tag --all && bit export lpmraven.semantic-accessible-react-component-library
scripts.prerelease: yarn run lint && yarn run build
